room_title: Escape room "The Hidden Cabin" by Adventure Rooms in Hartford
review: Super fun but we had a hard time beating the Cabin! I wouldn't recommend it for beginners. We had two newbies and two who had previously done Swiss original. Maybe a larger group could have solved it in time. Definitely going to go back for another room!

room_title: Escape room "The Hidden Cabin" by Adventure Rooms in Hartford
review: We had a group of seven and finished with a minute on the clock. We had a hard time in the beginning but got the hang of it later. I would recommend the Cabin room to anyone who loves challenging puzzles.

room_title: Escape room "The Hidden Cabin" by Adventure Rooms in Hartford
review: This place is so fun. Me and my boyfriend did the Cabin and were able to solve all of the puzzles and escape.

room_title: Escape room "The Hidden Cabin" by Adventure Rooms in Hartford
review: This was a blast! We did the log cabin and found the puzzles intriguing and creative. Can't wait to go back and try a different room.
